Question: As a young man, actor Anthony Quinn applied to study with this person at Taliesin.
Hints: His third wife, Olgivanna, ran the Fellowship after this person's death, until her own death in Scottsdale, Arizona, in 1985.
This person designed over 400 built structures of which about 300 survive as of 2005.
For a time, this person made more from selling art than from his work as an architect.
